item.title: object ~ dream journal
item.description: few things interest me more in this life than lucid dreaming ~ to gain awareness that you’re dreaming, granting you powers of genie where what you wish, becomes so ~

item.title: my most used shortcuts
item.description: use often esc == exit scope âŒ˜ n == new object âŒ˜ 0-9 == format text-style intend to incorporate âŒ˜ â‡§ r == open relation-pane to fix breaks âŒ˜ - == zoom-out if i enter âŒ˜ 0 to format text-style: text, the same key combination also doubles as the output default zoom so i must use this shortcut following âŒ˜ 0 to zoom-out

item.title: the rules of a system
item.description: a system is defined by the set of rules it applies to a given input, yielding a repeatable, expected output ~ on it's own, a system functions as designed, in perpetuity ~ often, it is the operators of a system that don't adhere to its rules + therefore, skew the desired results/output ~ it would be of immense benefit for one to view their time + effort spent organizing on anytype as not just organizing, but rather building a system that organizes ~ it's a subtle distinction but creating a system that continually re/produces a desired result means you only have to build it once and like a factory, it will continue to produce just as it was designed to ~ in this series, i will be compiling some of the rules from my system that injects order through consistency as the scale of content grows w/ time ~
